channel.title: Help Adding Highscores Via Mysql/Website
channel.description:
I have been trying to Follow [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html[/url] <---- this tutorial, But I get confused since I'm trying to use my webhost instead of Xampp. So, I know that I have to like remote sql connection to something but if you can fully help me on how to add these, Please do, I've been trying for a week straight, but i don't know why there aren't any tutorials with using a webhost and that you need to use like remote sql host ip.
Please help me, my msn is Lucasthemod@gmail.com
I'll always been on so talk and help me please
